Articles.Content:
Here is the GDI Firehawk:

![screenshot39.png](http://file1.npage.de/008071/25/bilder/screenshot39.png)

![screenshot40.png](http://file1.npage.de/008071/25/bilder/screenshot40.png)

You need the Mk2 Hull Bicoupler V1.1

[http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=4886.0](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=4886.0)
It\'s a very generic design, sadly. The Horizontal VAB is quite limiting, but congratulations.

> 
> It\'s a very generic design, sadly. The Horizontal VAB is quite limiting, but congratulations.

Limiting?

I built *this* in it.

![wXh60.png](http://i.imgur.com/wXh60.png)

> 
> Limiting?
> 
> I built *this* in it.
> 
> ![wXh60.png](http://i.imgur.com/wXh60.png)

Wow.
